about_the_game:
Welcome to The Continuum, a unique stealth-action platformer set in the heart of a high-stakes interstellar conflict. Engage in strategic resource management and platforming challenges as you navigate an ever-changing cosmos to rescue allies and disrupt the formidable Hivemind.

Stealth-action platformer

Make your way through challenging environments utilizing a mix of stealth, combat, and platforming elements. Balance your approach between remaining undetected and engaging with the Hivemind forces only when necessary.

In-depth Resource Management

Manage your resources wisely. Every decision you make, every ally you save, every encounter you engage in, has an impact on your journey. Space and resources are finite, making every choice critical to your mission's success.

Dynamic Hivemind AI

Face the Hivemind, an enemy collective with a unified goal that adapt based on your actions. Learn to understand their behavior, manipulate their perceptions, and use the environment to your advantage.

Engaging Story and Characters

Form alliances with the Abeds, an alien species struggling for survival against the invasion of the almighty Hivemind. Learn their backstories, complete quests, and earn their trust to gain valuable resources and aid in your mission.

High-Tech Gadgets and Alien Abilities

Utilize a variety of high-tech gadgets and harness the unique abilities of your alien allies to gain an edge over the Hivemind. Upgrade your tools and powers to face increasingly formidable challenges.

Strategic Long-Term Planning

Map out your actions based on your understanding of the Hivemind and the broader conflict. Choose when to intervene, when to retreat, and when to make the final strike against the Hivemind's structures or queen.


With its blend of challenging stealth-action platforming, strategic decision-making, and engaging storytelling, The Continuum offers an immersive journey through a universe teetering on the brink of devastation. Can you outsmart the Hivemind and tip the balance of power in your favor?
